trans-unit.source: Creates a bitmap with the specified width, height, and color format

seg-source.mrk: Creates a bitmap with the specified width, height, and color format

target.mrk: Creates a bitmap with the specified width, height, and color format

trans-unit.source: Specifies the bitmap width, in pixels

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the bitmap width, in pixels

target.mrk: Specifies the bitmap width, in pixels

trans-unit.source: Specifies the bitmap height, in pixels

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the bitmap height, in pixels

target.mrk: Specifies the bitmap height, in pixels

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies the number of color planes used by the device

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of color planes used by the device

target.mrk: Specifies the number of color planes used by the device

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies the number of bits required to identify the color of a single pixel

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number of bits required to identify the color of a single pixel

target.mrk: Specifies the number of bits required to identify the color of a single pixel

trans-unit.source: [optional] Pointer to an array of color data used to set the colors in a rectangle of pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to an array of color data used to set the colors in a rectangle of pixels.

target.mrk: Pointer to an array of color data used to set the colors in a rectangle of pixels.

trans-unit.source: Each scan line in the rectangle must be word aligned (scan lines that are not word aligned must be padded with zeros).

seg-source.mrk: Each scan line in the rectangle must be word aligned (scan lines that are not word aligned must be padded with zeros).

target.mrk: Each scan line in the rectangle must be word aligned (scan lines that are not word aligned must be padded with zeros).

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is 0, the contents of the new bitmap is undefined.

seg-source.mrk: If this parameter is 0, the contents of the new bitmap is undefined.

target.mrk: If this parameter is 0, the contents of the new bitmap is undefined.
